titles.title: Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Twenty Eighth District of Texas.
Dismissing the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the Twenty Eighth District of Texas.

action.text: The House Committee on House Administration reported an original measure, H. Rept. 113-22, by Mrs. Miller (MI).

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 13.

action.text: Mrs. Miller (MI) asked unanimous consent to consider in the House.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Dismisses the election contest relating to the office of Representative from the 28th congressional district of Texas.
